author: ahinzmann
body:
Backport of #22914

This does not change persistent objects, but it does change the interface to MiniAOD slimmedAK8jets, allowing for computation of jet ID and substructure on top of MiniAOD.

Thus it may be worth cutting an analysis release 95X for this if parties agree.

@arizzi @gpetruc @rappoccio
title: Simplify pat jet constituent access in 94X
